name: Violent deaths
title: Violent deaths
description: This dataset presents estimates of the levels of violence in prehistoric and non-state societies, based on archaeological and ethnographic evidence.

sources.additionalInfo: This dataset presents estimates of the levels of violence in prehistoric and non-state societies, based on archaeological and ethnographic evidence.
sources.dataPublishedBy: Bowles, S. (2009), Gat, A. (2008), Knauft, B. M. et al (1987), Keeley, L. H. (1996), Pinker, S. (2011), and Walker, R. S., & Bailey, D. H. (2013)

owidTags: Ethnographic and Archaeological Evidence on Violent Deaths

fields.name: Share of violent deaths (prehistoric archeological sites)
